Class MultiChoiceQ

  • java.lang.Object
    • quiz.Question
      • quiz.MultiChoiceQ

  • public class MultiChoiceQ
extends Question
    This class is used to represent a multple choice question with five options.
    Author:
    FlightGuy

    • Constructor Detail

      • MultiChoiceQ

        MultiChoiceQ(java.lang.String questionText,
             int num,
             java.lang.String[] options,
             int correctAnswer)
        The constructor creates an object of MultiChoiceQ with its text, number in test, answers to choose from, and which answer is correct.
        Parameters:
        questionText - The text to be displayed for the question to be answered.
        num - The number the question is in the test.
        options - An array represent all of the possible answers to the question.
        correctAnswer - The array index in the options array that is the correct answer to the question.
